title: LF ADC sub for Ranked 5s team
body:
Hey!

I'm Paralel, and I just started a ranked 5s team.

I am looking for subs for the team, specifically an ADC. Everyone on the team is very dedicated, looking to both improve themselves and have a great time.

We are a team that cares about the competitive integrity of league and its community, meaning that if you elo boost or flame, this might not be the right team for you.

That being said, if you're looking to get some experience under your belt for working with a team and being able to talk to a coach (yes we have a coach, he's played on a couple different challenger teams) to improve your play and yourself, feel free to Add me in game: "Paralel".

And please be available to play from 12-3 PST today. Lastly, please be between Gold II and Plat II with solo queue experience in the role.

Thanks!
